snippet.title: PETSCII Raiders - Commodore 64 Homebrew Gameplay
snippet.description:
Captured via TheC64 Maxi

Developed by Peter Caspari for the BASIC 10liner Contest in 2023, PETSCII Raiders is based on the classic space invaders game. Destroy all raiders while avoiding guided projectiles from the mother ship at the top of the screen

Download: https://bunsen.itch.io/petscii-raiders-by-peter-caspari
